tool_description: Determines which astrological house each planet occupies based on planetary positions and house cusp calculations, including cusp proximity analysis.

planetary_positions.description: Array of planetary positions in degrees

planet_names.description: Names of planets corresponding to positions

house_cusps.description: Array of 12 house cusp positions in degrees

cusp_orb.description: Orb in degrees for cusp proximity analysis (1-10)

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: planetary_positions and planet_names must have equal length.
Invalid house cusps: Exactly 12 house cusp positions required.
Invalid cusp orb: cusp_orb must be between 1 and 10 degrees.
Position out of range: All positions must be between 0 and 360 degrees.
House calculation error: Unable to determine house placements with provided data.
usage: Provide planetary_positions with corresponding planet_names and house_cusps array. Optionally set cusp_orb for proximity analysis. Returns house placement for each planet.

house_placements.description: Array of house numbers (1-12) for each planet

cusp_conjunctions.description: Planets conjunct house cusps within specified orb
